data.eml:eml: Species of the subgenus Minuspio (Polychaeta: Spionidae: Prionospio) from the southern coast of Turkey (Levantine Sea, eastern Mediterranean), with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dagli, Ertan, Çinar, Melih Ertan (2011): Species of the subgenus Minuspio (Polychaeta: Spionidae: Prionospio) from the southern coast of Turkey (Levantine Sea, eastern Mediterranean), with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 3043: 35-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206763
